alert.note: Alert for Hodgeman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 8:16PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN FORD...SOUTHEASTERN HODGEMAN AND WESTERN EDWARDS COUNTIES THROUGH 900 PM CST... At 815 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dodge City, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...A wind gust of 52 mph was measured at the Dodge City Airport at 8:15 pm. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Spearville around 820 PM CST. Bellefont around 825 PM CST. Offerle around 835 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Kinsley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
